patthana17.1:5.1: Kusalaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.1:5.2: Kusalaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe …
patthana17.1:5.4: kusalaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana17.1:6.1: Akusalaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.1:6.2: Akusalaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe …
patthana17.1:6.4: akusalaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana17.1:7.1: Abyākataṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.1:7.2: Abyākataṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.1:7.3: Abyākataṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.1:8.1: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate terasa.
patthana17.1:10.1: Abyākataṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.1:11.1: Kusalaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana17.1:11.2: Kusalaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana17.1:11.3: Kusalaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti naārammaṇapaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.1:12.1: Akusalaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.1:13.1: Abyākataṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana17.1:13.2: Abyākataṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana17.1:13.3: Abyākataṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti naārammaṇapaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.1:14.1: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naārammaṇe nava, naadhipatiyā terasa … pe … napurejāte terasa … pe … najhāne namagge tīṇi, navippayutte nava … pe … novigate nava.
patthana17.1:18.1: Kusalo sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo nakusalassa nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … pe ….
patthana17.1:19.1: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa, adhipatiyā sattarasa, anantare nava … pe … sahajāte terasa, aññamaññe nava, nissaye terasa, upanissaye aṭṭhārasa, pacchājāte nava, kamme terasa, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre … pe … magge terasa, sampayutte nava, vippayutte nava … pe … avigate terasa.
patthana17.1:22.1: Akusalaṃ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.1:22.2: Akusalaṃ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe …
patthana17.1:22.4: akusalaṃ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naakusalo nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana17.1:23.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … sahajāte aṭṭha … pe … āsevane tīṇi … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … jhāne magge pañca … pe … avigate aṭṭha.
patthana17.1:26.1: Abyākataṃ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana17.1:26.2: Abyākataṃ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana17.1:26.3: Abyākataṃ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naakusalo nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā.
patthana17.1:27.1: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā aṭṭha … pe … napurejāte pañca … pe … navipāke pañca, najhāne namagge nasampayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā novigate tīṇi.
patthana17.1:28.1: Kusalaṃ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.1:29.1: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate terasa.
